data.name: Tip_Content_Placeholder
data.value: Text of the tip would appear here. Zombie ipsum reversus ab viral inferno, nam rick grimes malum cerebro. De carne lumbering animata corpora quaeritis. Summus brains sit​​, morbo vel maleficia? De apocalypsi gorger omero undead survivor dictum mauris.
data.comment: Placeholder content for tips during database initialization

data.name: Equipment_Error_FailedToLoadUserEquipment

data.comment: Message when no equipment recommendations can be provided

data.comment: Prefix for equipment recommendations, {0} is the recommendation

data.name: Equipment_NoCompatibleEquipmentFound
data.value: No compatible user equipment found for {0}. Consider: {1}
data.comment: Message when no compatible equipment found, {0} is target, {1} is suggestion

data.name: Equipment_ExcellentMatch
data.comment: Message for excellent equipment match, {0} is equipment, {1} is target

data.name: Equipment_VeryGoodMatch
data.value: ✓ Very Good: {0} works very well for {1}
data.comment: Message for very good equipment match, {0} is equipment, {1} is target

data.name: Equipment_WorkableMatch
data.value: ⚠ Workable: {0} can work for {1} with compromises
data.comment: Message for workable equipment match, {0} is equipment, {1} is target

data.value: This combination can work for {0} with some compromises.
data.comment: Message about equipment combination working with compromises, {0} is target description

data.name: Equipment_Settings_MilkyWay
data.comment: Recommended camera settings for Milky Way photography

data.name: Equipment_Notes_MilkyWay
data.value: Wide-angle lens essential for capturing galactic arch. Fast aperture critical for light gathering.
data.comment: Equipment notes for Milky Way photography

data.name: Equipment_Settings_Moon
data.comment: Recommended camera settings for Moon photography

data.name: Equipment_Notes_Moon
data.value: Telephoto lens for detail. Moon is bright - low ISO and fast shutter prevent overexposure.
data.comment: Equipment notes for Moon photography

data.name: Equipment_Settings_Planets
data.comment: Recommended camera settings for planet photography

data.name: Equipment_Notes_Planets
data.value: Long telephoto essential. Planets are small - maximum focal length recommended.
data.comment: Equipment notes for planet photography

data.name: Equipment_Settings_DeepSky
data.comment: Recommended camera settings for deep sky photography

data.name: Equipment_Notes_DeepSky
data.value: Medium telephoto with tracking mount. Requires dark skies and precise tracking.
data.comment: Equipment notes for deep sky photography

data.name: Equipment_Settings_StarTrails
data.comment: Recommended camera settings for star trail photography

data.name: Equipment_Notes_StarTrails
data.value: Wide-angle for dramatic trails. Lower ISO to minimize noise in long exposures.
data.comment: Equipment notes for star trail photography
